QuestData.Title: Come Prepared
QuestData.Description: We must always come prepared. Prepared with gear. Prepared with plans. Prepared with gear plans!$B$BAll of the ships in all of the Alliance fleets stow a survival kit. A lot of our tools came from a survival kit. My balloon came from a survival kit too! But now it's gone. I need another survival kit!$B$BThere's a ship to the southeastish. Let's hope that the survivors were dumb and didn't take the survival kit. More survival kit for us!
QuestData.CompletionText: A whole big box of amazing! That's what it is. I need more amazing in my life.$B$BDon't worry, I'll share.
QuestData.RewardText: Let me see, let me see... flare gun... balloon... no rope. Never any rope. Terribly impractical if you do ask me. Rope should be mandatory.
